title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020)), after consulting with the Garda
heading: (Retirement) (Amendment) Regulations 2024.

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020)), after consulting with the Garda
heading: These Regulations shall come into operation on 3 September 2024.
text_raw:
2. 

These Regulations shall come into operation on 3 September 2024.

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020)), after consulting with the Garda
heading: Regulation 2(b) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (Retirement)
text_raw:
3. 
Regulation 2(b) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (Retirement) 
Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 28 of 2018) is amended by the substitution of “62” 
for “60”. 

The Government hereby approve of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

3 September, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 September, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [438] 3
